entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023
